Source.Name: libqb
Source.Summary: libqb is a library providing high performance logging, tracing, ipc, and poll.
Source.Description: libqb is a library with the primary purpose of providing high-performance, reusable features for client-server architecture, such as logging, tracing, inter-process communication (IPC), and polling. libqb is not intended to be an all-encompassing library, but instead provide focused APIs that are highly tuned for maximum performance for client-server applications.
